channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- OrangeScrum
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- OrangeScrum

item.title: CVE-2023-0454|2023-02-01T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- orangescrum
item.description: OrangeScrum version 2.0.11 allows an authenticated external attacker to delete arbitrary local files from the server. This is possible because the application uses an unsanitized attacker-controlled parameter to construct an internal path.

item.title: CVE-2023-0624|2023-02-09T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- orangescrum
item.description: OrangeScrum version 2.0.11 allows an external attacker to obtain arbitrary user accounts from the application. This is possible because the application returns malicious user input in the response with the content-type set to text/html.

item.title: CVE-2023-0738|2023-04-04T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- orangescrum
item.description: OrangeScrum version 2.0.11 allows an external attacker to obtain arbitrary user accounts from the application. This is possible because the application returns malicious user input in the response with the content-type set to text/html.

item.title: CVE-2023-0164|2023-01-18T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- orangescrum
item.description: OrangeScrum version 2.0.11 allows an authenticated external attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the server. This is possible because the application injects an attacker-controlled parameter into a system function.
